casebody.data:
SEABORN LEROY TRUESDALE and Hobson B. Taylor, Appellants, v. NEW YORK LIFE INS. CO., Appellee. No. 3898. Circuit Court of Appeals, Fourth Circuit. Oct. 21, 1935. Toy R. Gregory, of Lancaster, S. C. (Gregory & Gregory and Williams & Stewart, all of Lancaster, S. C., on the brief), for appellants. Pinckney L. Cain, of Columbia, S. C. (Thomas, Lumpkin & Cain, of Columbia, S. G, on the brief), for appellee.

Before PARKER, NORTHCOTT, and SOPER, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

The decree appealed from will be affirmed on the authority of the decision of this court in New York Life Ins. Co. v. Seaborn Leroy Truesdale and Eva B. Truesdale, 79 F.(2d) 481, decided October 8, 1935.

Affirmed.
